learner.generic: Generic error, there is no specific description

clusterer.fit_before: You must fit the model before getting the clusters or the centroids.

dbscan.not_none: Data cannot be None and data must be at least composed of one point.
dbscan.index_eq_data: The number of indexes must be equal to the number of data points.
dbscan.only_univariate: Only univariate time series is currently supported.
dbscan.format: Only univariate time series is currently supported.
dbscan.window_need_stride: Either you don't specify both window and stride or you specify both.
dbscan.stride_lt_window: Stride must be less or equal than window
dbscan.compatible_stride: The value (data.shape[0] - window) % stride must be 0.
